fr:title.text: On the Use of Isabelle/HOL for Formalizing New Concise Axiomatic Systems for Classical Propositional Logic

fr:frontmatter.fr:title: On the Use of Isabelle/HOL for Formalizing New Concise Axiomatic Systems for Classical Propositional Logic
fr:frontmatter.fr:meta: 27th International Conference on Types for Proofs and Programs (TYPES 2021)

@unpublished{FromV21-TYPES, abstract = {We describe novel axiomatic systems for classical propositional logic: one based on the K and S combinators and elimination rules and one on transitivity of implication, explosion and rules for disjunction. We show how Isabelle/HOL helps investigate such systems.}, author = {Asta Halkjær From and Jørgen Villadsen}, note = {27th International Conference on Types for Proofs and Programs (TYPES 2021), accepted abstract}, title = {On the Use of Isabelle/HOL for Formalizing New Concise Axiomatic Systems for Classical Propositional Logic}, url = {https://types21.liacs.nl/download/on-the-use-of-isabelle-hol-for-formalizing-new-concise-axiomatic-systems-for-classical-propositional-logic/}, year = {2021}, }

fr:mainmatter.html:p: We describe novel axiomatic systems for classical propositional logic: one based on the K and S combinators and elimination rules and one on transitivity of implication, explosion and rules for disjunction. We show how Isabelle/HOL helps investigate such systems.
